title: [Health] Feeling poorer than your friends in early adolescence is associated with worse mental health. Adolescents who see themselves as poorer than their friends were 17% more likely to report being bullied or picked on compared to those who feel financially the same as friends at age 11.

[Health] 15.6% fewer parents chose a high-added sugar beverage when packages displayed warnings with teaspoons of added sugar disclosures, reducing added sugar and calories in chosen beverages by 14.2% and 6.5%, respectively
